title: Inscribe
text: is a community platform that enables peer-to-peer and faculty-to-student communication, along with the ability to share rich resources .
featureText: Inscribe is a community-building platform uniquely designed to foster a connected, supportive learning environment. It empowers peer-to-peer and faculty-student engagement while offering a rich resource-sharing hub for learners at every stage.

features.title: Community-Driven Support
features.text: Inscribe breaks down silos, facilitating organic connections between students and faculty. This sense of belonging is crucial for retention, encouraging both knowledge sharing and overcoming challenges.

features.title: Adaptable Knowledge Base
features.text: Inscribe's repository of FAQs evolves with student queries and expert input. This reduces repetitive questions for advisors and offers a scalable, accessible knowledge hub for everyone.

features.title: Balance of Engagement & Control
features.text: While emphasizing peer support, Inscribe safeguards content quality. Smart moderation tools (like ROSI) and institutional oversight ensure information accuracy, and a reputation system motivates positive contribution.
